general.access_page_content: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) which protects personal data and privacy of all EU Citizens officially becomes effective on May 25, 2018. Therefore, to make your personal data secure and give you more data control based on GDPR, you can delete your account or send us request to anonymizing your account. We will process your request as soon as possible and notify you via your email account request status.
